en.ERROR_UPDATE_NOT_FOUND: The item could not be updated. It might have been modified or removed before the changes were submitted. A page refresh will fetch the current state.
en.ERROR_UPDATE_INVALID_INPUT: The item could not be updated. The submitted changes were invalid.
en.ERROR_REMOVE: The item could not be removed. It might have been changed meanwhile. A page refresh will fetch the current state.
en.ERROR_ADD: Could not add the item. Its parent might have been removed meanwhile.
